data.title: New and Used Ford Dealer in Ayer, MA
data.meta_description: Visit Gervais Ford for a variety of new and used cars by Ford in the Ayer area. Our Ford dealership, serving Littleton, Harvard and Acton, is ready to assist you!
data.text:
Welcome to Gervais Ford

How to purchase online

Gervais Ford in Ayer, MA treats the needs of each customer with paramount concern. We know that you have high expectations, and as a new and pre-owned car dealer, we enjoy the challenge of meeting and exceeding those standards every time. Allow us to demonstrate our commitment to excellence!

Our experienced sales staff is eager to share its knowledge of Ford cars and Ford F-150 & F-250 trucks with you. We encourage you to browse our online inventory, schedule a test drive, value your trade-in, and investigate financing options. You can also request more information about a vehicle using our online form or by calling (888) 861-9565.

We have an extensive lineup of new Ford vehicles for sale or for lease. Our inventory has a great selection of popular models such as Ford F150's, Ford Explorers, Ford Escapes, & Ford Edge, and many more. If you aren't looking for a new car, we have a great selection of pre-owned inventory. Also, our pre-owned inventory has a number of used cars, used trucks, used SUVs & used vans for sale near Lawrence & Worcester.
